attributes.action: give the same rights to co-habiting couples as those in a civil partnership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'All men (and women) are created equal'It is unfair and discriminatory that co-habiting couples have less rights than gay couples.I propose this discrimination is addressed immediately. If anything, it should have come before 'civil partnerships' in the pecking order.It may have gone on as long as 'living together'. I believe couples who have/intend having children should be married, but surely those who are too old or choose not to have kids are entitled to the same securities as those for whom it is biologically impossible.End this discrimination now!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
